title: Looking for people wanting to climb in Flex Mostly Bronze Silver FLEX QUEUE
body:
Aiming to build a team of 5 people for flex that are looking to actually grow as a team, in your interested add me. 
We already have 3 players locked in :) if your happy to grow as a person in game and with a team 2 spots are free up for more mates in league XD

replies.body: I will tonight i ll be online at 8 pm
